column1: 3635,0,"Privacy Policy   NaturalNews.com never rents or sells emails to third parties. We honor the privacy of our members and users, and unlike some other social networking sites, we DO NOT share user details with advertisers.  ",0000000001
3635,1,"NaturalNews.com honors all email unsubscribe requests and makes every attempt to honor the privacy of its members, viewers and sponsors.  ",0000000001
3635,2,"Postmaster Webseed 6336 N. Oracle Rd. 325-315 Tucson, AZ 85704 reply@naturalnews.com  ",0000001001
3635,3,"To opt-out of NaturalNews emails, simply click the ""unsubscribe"" link found at the bottom of any email from NaturalNews.  ",1000000000
3635,4,"If you experience any difficulty unsubscribing, simply forward this entire email to reply@naturalnews.com and you will be automatically unsubscribed.  ",1000000001
